recipesJson.name: DMC Blueberry Muffin Man
recipesJson.author: shakenvape007
recipesJson.description: A nice blueberry muffin using FLV only.  Enjoy!!  Give it 24 hours steep to mellow or good off the scale.

reviews.text: This is BOMB! Have been meaning to make a blueberry muffin, but I didn't actually get around to doing the testing. I mixed this up because it had been crummy weather here, and just pulled it out again and vaped it and it is PERFECT with my morning cup of tea. I wasn't sure about the cream notes but they really meld into the juice! Can't get enough!
